EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery.Send Email 4 - Post Webinar: Attended.IHL Post-Webinar Email: A
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks! Here’s Your Gx Webinar Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for joining us for our Grocery Experience (Gx) webinar with industry analyst IHL and two leading grocery retailers – Bashas & Northgate Market.
Want to watch the replay? Download it here <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/food-drug-mass-merchandise/ihl-webinar?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=decodinggrocery&utm_content=email5&utm_industry=retail]]>.
As we learned in the webinar, the world of grocery has changed, and likely permanently—30-40% of these new journeys that customers are experiencing in a COVID world will stick.
Are you ready to adapt?
Explore NCR Emerald <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/food-drug-mass-merchandise/emerald?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=decodinggrocery&utm_content=email4&utm_industry=retail]]>, the future-proofing, cloud-enabled retail technology that Bashas’ and Northgate Market count on to stay ready for anything.
Thanks again for joining!
